select r.rollcall_code, r.user_code, r.user_name, h.course_code, h.id, h.section_list sectionListJsonStr, h.total_students, h.exp_attendances_count, h.is_valid, h.created_by, h.updated_by, h.created_date, h.updated_date, r.state, r.section_name from sign_records r inner join sign_histories h on h.id=r.rollcall_code where h.is_valid = 1 and r.is_valid = 1

mapper.insert: insert into sign_histories ( id, course_code, user_code, section_list , attendances_count, total_students, exp_attendances_count, created_by ) values ( #{id}, #{courseCode}, #{userCode}, #{sectionListJsonStr}, #{attendancesCount}, #{totalStudents}, #{expAttendancesCount}, #{createdBy} )

insert into sign_records ( id, user_code, rollcall_code, open_id, state, user_name, section_name, created_by ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.userCode}, #{item.rollcallCode}, #{item.openId}, #{item.state}, #{item.userName}, #{item.sectionName}, #{item.createdBy} )

if.foreach:
update sign_histories
is_valid=#{item.isValid},
updated_by=#{item.updatedBy},
updated_date=#{item.updatedDate},
where id=#{item.id}

update sign_records
is_valid=#{item.isValid},
updated_by=#{item.updatedBy},
updated_date=#{item.updatedDate},
where rollcall_code=#{item.rollcallCode}
